description.p: Automatically generated OSCAL SSP from OpenControl guidance for Red Hat OpenShift Dedicated
This item is useless nevertheless required.
A holistic, top-level explanation of the FedRAMP authorization boundary.
The entire system as depicted in the system authorization boundary
FedRAMP SSP Template Section 13
Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.

description.p: Describe how is the software component satisfying the control.

remarks.p:
OpenShift Dedicated staff do not have physical access to the facility where the information system resides.
This control is inherited from Amazon Web Services.
